Well, i can follow you in howto make a really good dvd copy, but this is the way i prefer to do it:
Put the dvd in the dvdrom drive (AnyDVD removes protection), start CloneDVD2, press start and you got a descent copy in approximately 18 min.
That's all it takes and i'm pleased about this way.
